name: nanogallery
title: jQuery nanoGALLERY
description: Image gallery simplified. Touch enabled, responsive, justified/cascading/grid layout and it supports cloud storage. Featuring multi-level navigation in albums, lightbox, combinable hover effects on thumbnails, slideshow, fullscreen, pagination, image lazy load, themes, deep linking, browser back/forward navigation, i18n, and pulling in Flickr, Picasa and Google+ photo albums among others.
